yoast_head_json.description: Active listening requires practice, but it can reduce feelings of pressure and judgment to support someone's mental health.

yoast_head_json.og_description: Active listening requires practice, but it can reduce feelings of pressure and judgment to support someone's mental health.
yoast_head_json.author: Cassandra Kekich

@graph.name: How to Practice Active Listening | Supporting Mental Health
@graph.description: Active listening requires practice, but it can reduce feelings of pressure and judgment to support someone's mental health.

@graph.name: Cassandra Kekich
@graph.description: With her background in crisis intervention and law enforcement, Cassy is passionate about reducing the stigma surrounding men’s mental health, especially as it relates to the fields of first response, law enforcement, and military. She has also supported numerous men in mental health crises as a responder on Canada’s national suicide crisis line. Cassy seeks to contribute to advancing education and support systems for men experiencing mental health struggles.
